text: Darya Kasatkina was the defending champion, but chose not to participate this year. Paula Badosa Gibert won the title, defeating Anna Kalinskaya in the final, 6–3, 6–3. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === ==== Section 1 ==== ==== Section 2 ==== === Bottom half === ==== Section 3 ==== ==== Section 4 ==== == External links == * Main draw Girls' Singles French Open, 2015 Girls' Singles
